The [H]otel Lobby.desc: You are in the lobby of our beautiful hotel "The Pyramid". Here you can find our reception, the hotel bar and a shop. On your right you can find the elevator to all the rooms and on the left is of course the entrance through which you came in.

A revolving [d]oor.desc: This revolving door is the exit of the hotel
A revolving [d]oor.action_msg:
Thank you sir, for staying with us and
rescuing Bastet from the Pyramid. You 
are allways welcome back at our hotel.
You came as a guest and are now leaving 
as a friend!

The [S]treet.desc:
The outside of the hotel looks so close
and peaceful, yet you are not able to go out!
The [S]treet.open_acl_msg: No no no, you can't leave this hotel. You are locked in forever.

The [S]treet.desc:
The outside of the hotel looks so close
and peaceful.

The [E]levator.desc: The elevator will take you to any floor you like
The [E]levator.action_acl_msg: You don't have a VIP keycard, access denied
The [E]levator.state_desc: VIP access to second floor granted.
The [E]levator.action_msg: VIP access to second floor granted.

The [1]st Floor.desc: This is the hallway on the First Floor
The [1]st Floor.open_acl_msg: Access to this floor is for hotel guests only!

Room 10[1].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door
Room 10[1].desc:
This is room 101, your hotel room during Hacker Hotel 2020. You travelled a whole day 
to get to the event. You decide to chill out for a while.

[M]inibar.desc: How nice, the room has a minibar. You can use a drink.
[M]inibar.action_msg: You drank two beers from the minibar. You feel like getting another beer.
[M]inibar.state_desc: drank from the minibar, still thirsty

[R]obe.desc: A nice soft bathrobe of ancient egyptian cotton hangs over a chair.

Room 10[2].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door

Room 10[3].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door

Room 10[4].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door

The [2]nd Floor.desc: This is the hallway on the Second Floor
The [2]nd Floor.open_acl_msg: This floor is for VIP guests only!

Room 20[1].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door

Room 20[2].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door

Room 20[3].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door
Room 20[3].desc: This is room 203, you are not supposed to be here ;-)

[L]aptop.desc:
This looks like a standard laptop. Nothing special except the two barcode 
stickers on the back of the laptop:

Sticker 1     ‚ñà‚ñê ‚ñå ‚ñê ‚ñà  ‚ñå‚ñå ‚ñê‚ñê‚ñå‚ñê ‚ñå‚ñà  ‚ñå‚ñê ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñê ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñê ‚ñå‚ñà ‚ñå ‚ñê ‚ñå‚ñê‚ñà‚ñå‚ñà  ‚ñå‚ñå‚ñê‚ñå ‚ñà‚ñå‚ñå‚ñà     

Sticker 2     ‚ñà‚ñê ‚ñå ‚ñê‚ñå‚ñà‚ñà‚ñê‚ñå‚ñà ‚ñà‚ñå‚ñê‚ñê‚ñê‚ñå ‚ñà????? ‚ñê ‚ñå‚ñà‚ñà ‚ñà‚ñå‚ñà ‚ñê‚ñê‚ñê‚ñå ‚ñå ‚ñà ‚ñê‚ñà‚ñê‚ñê‚ñå     

As you can see, sticker 2 is a little damaged.
[L]aptop.action_str1:
You turn on the laptop, but it is locked by user 'hcarter'.
Please enter the correct password?
[L]aptop.action_msg:
You have unlocked the laptop, on the desktop you found
a note with the name "safe-code.txt". You open it and it
contains the following text:

* Take a product of 2 prime numbers
* If you split my code into two 2-digit numbers, both of them are prime numbers
* The number formed by the first 3 digits can be divided by the number formed by the 4th digit
* The number formed by the last 3 digits can be divided by the number formed by the 1st digit
* No digit in my code is lower than the previous digit
* ... last but not least, I'm not a fool :-)

[C]loset.desc: The closet contains some clothes and a safe.

[S]afe.desc: The hotel safe has a 4-digit access code

[B]ook.desc: This lookes like a very ancient mysterious book full of spells.
[B]ook.action_str1: Are you sure you want to read this ancient spell out loud?
[B]ook.action_msg:
There is a post-it on one of the pages. You turn to that
page and starting reading the spell out loud. You have
barely finished reading it when the room light starts to 
flicker and a person seems to materialize in the room.

It has not fully materialized in full yet while it rushes out
the door mumbling: "no no no... this can not be, who has
kept me locked in the twilight zone for so long. I need to
get to the Pyramid to set things straight.

You try to catch your breath and in the meantime you
see the figure rush out. You look and you see it go to 
the reception area.

[N]ote.action_msg:
The note shows a table:

                      Vigen√®re

 |ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
-+--------------------------

And has something scribbled in the side:

'The secret key can be found on the "garden"
of the "local area network"'

Room 20[4].open_acl_msg: The door is locked, please use your keycard to unlock the door

The [4]th Floor.desc: This is the hallway on the Fourth Floor

Room 40[4].open_acl_msg:
Not Found

The requested ROOM was not found on this floor.

[V]IP guest.desc:
This guest looks posh, I bet she is a VIP. Now wait, is that her keycard
lying on the bar?
[V]IP guest.action_msg: You succesfully copied the VIPs keycard

Keycard-[C]opy.desc: A brand new copy of the VIP keycard

[P]roxmark III.desc: The Proxmark is an RFID swiss-army tool, allowing for both high and low level interactions with the vast majority of RFID tags and systems world-wide.
[P]roxmark III.action_acl_msg: You need some money to buy the Proxmark III

[B]lue Shark.desc:
This is a very nice fluffy shark (that seems to
be getting quite popular in certain circles).
[B]lue Shark.action_acl_msg: You need some money to buy the Blue Shark
[B]lue Shark.action_msg: Congratulations on buying a nice fluffy Blue Shark

The [R]eception.desc: The reception does resemble the Hacker Hotel reception quite remarkably.

The [R]eceptionist.action_acl_msg: Hello again, you are already checked in :-)
The [R]eceptionist.action_msg:
"Hello, Can I check in please?"

"Welcome to Hotel Pyramid and thank you for choosing us during your stay at 
Hacker Hotel 2020. I have checked you in, here is your keycard. Your room 
number is 101, located on the 1st floor."

[P]icture frame.desc:
That's strange, I did not see this picture frame before. And why would anyone 
draw hieroglyphs on a screenshot of an eighties music video and hang it on the wall???

Wait, there is something very tiny written on the picture frame...
[P]icture frame.action_msg:
"Walk like an Egyptian" on this picture and the entrance room to the Pyramid 
will open up to you!

The [D]ungeon.desc:
Your light is blinding me so I can't see much as it is very dark in the Dungeon.
Please get into a dark area so my eyes can adjust to these poor light conditions.

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Khonsu will offer Incense
* The one who kneels 3 times will bring element Water.

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Khonsu will kneel more than once.
* The one who offers Incense will bring element Fire.

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Bes will bring element Air
* Anubis will be kneeling once more than the one bringing element Earth

[G]uard.desc: There is a guard near the tunnel
[G]uard.action_acl_msg:
Access to the tunnel can only be granted to a group
of 4 people, each bringing one of the 4 elements.
[G]uard.action_msg:
Make sure your offering is perfect, otherwise the High Priest will
not trust you and rejects access to the secret Pyramid.

Here are your personal hints:

* Anubis will bring a Robe as offering, he will not kneel 2 times.
* The one bringing the element Air will offer something other than Fruit

Papyrus [R]oll.desc:
Please follow these instructions carefully if you want
to enter the tunnel. The guard is very picky on who he lets
through. 

You can only enter the tunnel with 4 people at
the same time. Each person must choose the correct
offering (wine, fruit, robe or incense) and kneel the 
right amount of times (1, 2, 3 or 4 times).

Last, but certainly not least, you must all bring one of the
four elements of nature (earth, air, fire or water).

Good luck!

High [P]riest.desc: The high priest is standing at the altar where you have placed your offering.
High [P]riest.action_str1:
In order to allow you access to the secret Pyramid, you need
to work together. Please give me the sum of all of your
personal access-codes.
High [P]riest.action_msg:
It is good to see a group work so well together, I have ordered
the guard to open the tunnel for you!
High [P]riest.state_desc: The priest allows access to the tunnel

[A]ltar.desc: The offering altar is where you can place your offerings to the high priest.
[A]ltar.state_desc: The offer made the High Priest visible

[T]unnel.desc: A dark and long tunnel that leads to the Pyramid
[T]unnel.open_acl_msg: The tunnel is closed, only the priest can tell the guard to let you in.

[G]rand Gallery.desc: The grand gallery is the main chamber of the pyramid.

[S]ecret message.desc: There is a secret message on the wall

[G]host of Ra.desc:
This is the ghost whom you released in room 203. 
His name is Ra, the sun-god. Unfortunately he is 
under a spell and is not much of a help to you now.
[G]host of Ra.action_acl_msg: You can't talk to a ghost, break the spell first!
[G]host of Ra.action_msg:
The spell is partly broken, one more hot summer to
revive Ra!

[R]a.action_str1:
"Please help me Ra!"

"Off course I will help you free our
beloved Cat Goddess! Please tell
me the name of her adversary!"
[R]a.action_msg:
Ohhh not Setesh again! I will end this once and 
all!

[S]tone door.desc:
This door gives entrance to the master chamber.
However, it is protected by a hieroglyph code that
you will need to solve to get in.
Mind the gap when you enter the master chamber!
[S]tone door.action_acl_msg:
Don't go in here without the help of Ra.
You won't survive without him!

[M]aster Chamber.desc:
You reached the deepest most secret part
of the Pyramid. The master chamber!

[B]astet.desc:
Look at that, it is Bastet! The lovely
figure on your badge.
[B]astet.action_msg:
Thank you, thank you, thank you!
You have done so much for me by
releasing Ra, breaking the spell and
rescuing me. I will be forever in your
debt.

Please accept this gem as a gift as a
token of my gratitude!

Showing it at the hotel exit will allow
you to leave the hotel.

[I]ncense.desc: The kind of incense used for rituals.

[A]TM machine.desc: Hey, the ATM is hacked and gives out free $100 bills
[A]TM machine.action_msg: You have withdrawn $100 and put it in your wallet
[A]TM machine.action_acl_msg: Please play fair and don't use the ATM so often!
[A]TM machine.state_desc: You have withdrawn $100 from the ATM
